HeadTab is a minimalistic, clean new tab page

It places the weather, date, time, bookmarks, battery and tabs playing audio right on your new tab page.
The search bar is accessible anywhere by just typing on the page. 

HeadTab integrates nicely with Spotify and YouTube, displaying newly started songs on the info dashboard for a few seconds. 
It also has the functionality to display Spotify lyrics on the info dashboard when lyrics are turned on on the Spotify page. 

You can turn any feature or item on the HeadTab page on and off with the settings app. You can also find almost any setting you would expect here.
